metadata.title: 5224-1 -- Ghostscript vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Ghostscript incorrectly handled certain PostScript files. If a user or automated system were tricked into processing a specially crafted file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Ghostscript to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5224-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ghostscript - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1 ghostscript-x - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1 libgs-dev - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1 ghostscript-doc - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1 libgs9 - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1 libgs9-common - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
